languages.text: "Сегодня Кхейн вновь обагрил свои руки кровью — нашей и чужой! Вам нужно научиться принимать свои страхи, усмирить свой гнев..."

traits.locale_text: "Сегодня Кхейн вновь обагрил свои руки кровью — нашей и чужой! Вам нужно научиться принимать свои страхи, усмирить свой гнев..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня Кхейн вновь обагрил свои руки кровью — нашей и чужой! Вам нужно научиться принимать свои страхи, усмирить свой гнев..."

traits.locale_text: "Today Khein bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today Khein bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: «Hoy Khaine ha vuelto a mancharse las manos de sangre, ¡con la nuestra y la de otros! Debéis aprender a aceptar vuestros miedos, a templar vuestra ira...».
languages.original_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy Khaine ha vuelto a mancharse las manos de sangre, ¡con la nuestra y la de otros! Debéis aprender a aceptar vuestros miedos, a templar vuestra ira...».
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: 「今日、カインはその手を再び血で染めた…我々と他の者たちの血でだ！君は怒りを抑えるために、恐怖を受け入れることを学ばなければならないのだ…」
languages.original_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."

traits.locale_text: 「今日、カインはその手を再び血で染めた…我々と他の者たちの血でだ！君は怒りを抑えるために、恐怖を受け入れることを学ばなければならないのだ…」
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: “今天，凯恩的手又沾满了鲜血，沾满了我们和其他人的鲜血！你必须学会接受你的恐惧，驯服你的愤怒……”
languages.original_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."

traits.locale_text: “今天，凯恩的手又沾满了鲜血，沾满了我们和其他人的鲜血！你必须学会接受你的恐惧，驯服你的愤怒……”
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: « Aujourd'hui, les mains de Khaine sont à nouveau rouges de sang. Du nôtre, mais pas uniquement ! Vous devez apprendre à accepter vos peurs, à dompter votre colère... »
languages.original_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."

traits.locale_text: « Aujourd'hui, les mains de Khaine sont à nouveau rouges de sang. Du nôtre, mais pas uniquement ! Vous devez apprendre à accepter vos peurs, à dompter votre colère... »
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Heute hat sich Khaine wieder die Hände mit Blut befleckt – mit unserem und dem der anderen! Ihr müsst lernen, Eure Ängste anzunehmen, Eure Wut zu bändigen ..."
languages.original_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."

traits.locale_text: "Heute hat sich Khaine wieder die Hände mit Blut befleckt – mit unserem und dem der anderen! Ihr müsst lernen, Eure Ängste anzunehmen, Eure Wut zu bändigen ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Khaine, bugün ellerini tekrar kana buladı. Hem bizim hem de başkalarının kanına!.. Öfkeni dizginlemek için korkularını kabullenmeyi öğrenmelisin..."
languages.original_text: "Today Khaine bloodied his hands again — with our blood and others'! You must learn to accept your fears, to tame your anger..."

traits.locale_text: "Khaine, bugün ellerini tekrar kana buladı. Hem bizim hem de diğerlerinin kanlarıyla!.. Öfkeni dizginlemek için korkularını kabullenmeyi öğrenmelisin..."
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01
